summary.executive_summary: ADP SecurTime is a workforce management solution designed to streamline attendance tracking, timesheets, payroll, and leave management. It offers real-time visibility into employee data, helping businesses improve productivity, reduce costs, and ensure compliance.
summary.detailed_summary: ADP SecurTime provides a comprehensive platform for managing diverse workforces, including features for attendance, shift scheduling, leave, and overtime management. It offers biometric devices and BYO device options to suit different organizational needs, ensuring accurate time recording and preventing time fraud. The solution integrates with payroll and HCM systems, providing real-time data and insights. ADP SecurTime offers flexible plans, including cloud-based options, and supports various industries, providing tailored solutions to meet specific needs.
summary.comprehensive_summary:
ADP SecurTime is a workforce management solution focused on simplifying time and attendance processes. 

**Features:**
*   Attendance Management
*   Shift scheduling
*   Leave Management
*   Overtime Management
*   Timesheets
*   Role-based dashboards
*   Approval workflow
*   Employee Engagement
*   Biometric devices (facial recognition, fingerprint, RFID)
*   Mobile App and Web Punch
*   Integration with Payroll and HCM solutions.

**Benefits:**
*   Real-time visibility into employee data
*   Improved productivity
*   Reduced costs
*   Compliance with labor laws
*   Prevention of time fraud
*   Streamlined scheduling
*   Accurate payroll processing

**Use Cases:**
The documentation highlights various industries that can benefit from ADP SecurTime, including:
*   Construction
*   Manufacturing
*   Transport & Logistics
*   Banking and financial services
*   Healthcare
*   Professional & Technical Services
*   Retail
*   E-commerce

The solution offers industry-specific features and benefits to address the unique challenges of each sector. The product also offers features like geo-fencing, geo-tagging, and mobile app capabilities to track employees in the field. ADP SecurTime provides a secure, cloud-based platform with advanced biometric capabilities and data privacy measures.
key_points: Simplifies attendance tracking, timesheets, payroll, and leave management.
Offers real-time visibility into employee data.
Provides biometric device options (facial recognition, fingerprint, etc.) and BYO device support.
Helps reduce time fraud and improve compliance.
Integrates with payroll and HCM solutions.
Offers mobile app and web punch functionality.
Suitable for various industries with tailored solutions.
summary.value_proposition: ADP SecurTime empowers businesses to efficiently manage their workforce, improve productivity, and reduce costs through accurate time tracking and streamlined processes.

features.name: Time and Attendance Tracking
features.description: Accurately tracks employee time and attendance, reducing errors and time fraud. Provides a real-time view of attendance data.
use_cases: Tracking employee hours for payroll
Monitoring employee attendance in real-time

features.name: Shift Scheduling
features.description: Enables creation and management of employee shift schedules, including automated shift scheduling based on employee availability and skills.
use_cases: Creating shift schedules for retail employees
Managing rotating shifts in manufacturing

features.name: Leave Management
features.description: Automates leave request and approval processes, defining leave policies for different employee groups.  Provides employees with on-the-go leave application and approval.
use_cases: Managing vacation requests for office staff
Handling sick leave requests for remote employees

features.name: Overtime Management
features.description: Tracks and manages employee overtime, including defining overtime policies for specific employee groups. Helps control overtime costs and ensure compliance with labor laws.
use_cases: Monitoring overtime hours for construction workers
Managing overtime for project-based employees

features.name: Biometric Authentication
features.description: Offers biometric authentication options, including facial recognition, fingerprint scanning, and thermal scanning, to ensure accurate time recording and improve security.
use_cases: Using facial recognition for employee check-in
Employing fingerprint scanning for secure access control

features.name: Mobile App
features.description: Provides a mobile app for employees to track attendance, request leave, and view schedules from anywhere. Includes features like geo-tagging and geo-fencing.
use_cases: Tracking attendance for field service employees
Allowing remote workers to clock in/out

features.name: Real-time Tracking
features.description: Offers real-time tracking of employee attendance and location, providing better visibility into the workforce.  Includes alerts and notifications.
use_cases: Monitoring the location of delivery drivers
Tracking attendance at multiple store locations

features.name: Reporting and Analytics
features.description: Provides customizable reports and dashboards to gain insights into labor costs, spot irregularities, and improve decision-making. Includes location-based reporting.
use_cases: Analyzing overtime costs by department
Tracking employee attendance trends over time

features.name: Payroll Integration
features.description: Integrates with payroll systems to streamline the payroll process and ensure accurate paychecks. Seamlessly converts employee work time to accurate paychecks.
use_cases: Automatically transferring time and attendance data to payroll
Calculating employee pay based on hours worked

features.name: Role-Based Dashboards
features.description: Provides different dashboards and views based on different roles in the organization. Allows users to see relevant information based on their role.
use_cases: Managers viewing team attendance
Employees viewing their own timecards

features.name: Approval Workflow
features.description: Enables the creation of workflows based on different tasks for easy approval from supervisors. Streamlines the approval process for timecards, leave requests, and other tasks.
use_cases: Approving employee timecards
Approving leave requests

features.name: Geo-Fencing
features.description: Allows setting geographic restrictions to manage workforce within a defined area. Captures attendance of employees assigned to a specific location only when they are within the designated geofence.
benefits: Ensure employee presence at designated locations
use_cases: Ensuring delivery drivers are at the correct location
Restricting attendance tracking to a specific store location

features.name: Alerts and Notifications
features.description: Provides live attendance tracking, alerts, and notifications to improve workforce management. Sends alerts to managers if an employee is absent or late.
use_cases: Notifying managers of late arrivals
Alerting employees to missed punches

features.name: Data Privacy and Security
features.description: Employs highly secure AWS Cloud data centers with tamper-proof database access. Includes multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, and secure API integration.
benefits: Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations
use_cases: Protecting employee data from unauthorized access
Ensuring compliance with GDPR
features.technical_details: Highly secure AWS Cloud data centres, Multifactor authentication, Role-based access control, Secure API integration

features.name: BYO Device Integration
features.description: Allows integration with existing biometric devices, enabling clients to adopt cloud-based time attendance systems without replacing current hardware.
use_cases: Integrating with existing fingerprint scanners
Connecting to existing facial recognition systems

benefits.headline: Eliminate Time Theft and Reduce Payroll Costs
benefits.description: ADP SecurTime helps prevent time fraud, ghost employees, and time leakage, leading to significant cost savings. By accurately tracking employee time and attendance, businesses can avoid overpaying for unworked hours and reduce overall payroll expenses.
proof_points: Time fraud can cost businesses up to 5% of gross payroll.
29% of all businesses are affected by ghost employee fraud.
Reduce time tracking errors by 30% on average with a Time & Attendance tracking system.
benefits.business_impact: Reduced payroll costs, improved profitability, minimized financial risks.

benefits.headline: Improve Workforce Visibility and Productivity
benefits.description: Gain a single, accurate, real-time view of your workforce's attendance, performance, and productivity. This enhanced visibility allows for better management of teams, optimized resource allocation, and improved overall productivity across multiple locations and diverse workforces.
proof_points: On average, businesses suffer 35.5% loss in productivity from unplanned absenteeism.
benefits.business_impact: Increased productivity, optimized resource allocation, improved operational efficiency.

benefits.headline: Simplify Time and Attendance Management for Diverse Workforces
benefits.description: ADP SecurTime streamlines time and attendance tracking for various employee types (full-time, part-time, contract, gig) and work arrangements (on-premise, remote, mobile). It automates processes, reduces administrative burden, and ensures compliance with labor laws, regardless of workforce complexity.
supporting_features: Biometric options (facial recognition, fingerprint, thermal scanning)
proof_points: Clients surveyed rated ADP SecurTime as 4 out of 5 stars on average.
benefits.business_impact: Reduced administrative costs, improved compliance, enhanced employee satisfaction.

benefits.headline: Ensure Compliance and Minimize Legal Risks
benefits.description: ADP SecurTime helps businesses comply with labor laws and regulations by accurately tracking employee hours, overtime, and leave. The system's automated calculations and reporting capabilities minimize the risk of compliance violations and potential legal issues.
proof_points: Yes, complying with labour laws and controlling overtime costs are two of the biggest benefits of online time and attendance solutions.
benefits.business_impact: Reduced legal risks, improved compliance, minimized penalties.

benefits.headline: Improve Employee Safety and Hygiene
benefits.description: ADP SecurTime offers advanced biometric capabilities like mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning to ensure a safer and healthier work environment. Contactless options minimize physical contact and promote better hygiene, contributing to employee well-being and reducing the spread of illness.
benefits.business_impact: Reduced absenteeism, improved employee morale, enhanced workplace safety.

Simplify Time and Attendance Management for Diverse Workforces
Ensure Compliance and Minimize Legal Risks

use_cases.title: Preventing Time Theft and Ghost Employees
use_cases.scenario: A business is experiencing payroll discrepancies and suspects employees are clocking in for each other or that 'ghost employees' are on the payroll.
use_cases.problem_solved: Losses due to time fraud and ghost employees, inaccurate payroll, and compliance risks.
use_cases.solution_approach: Using biometric authentication (fingerprint, facial recognition) to ensure accurate time recording and prevent unauthorized entries.  Audits and customizable reports help uncover irregularities.

use_cases.title: Managing a Distributed Workforce
use_cases.scenario: A company has employees working in multiple locations, including on-premise, remote, and 'feet-on-street' employees, making it difficult to track attendance and productivity.
use_cases.problem_solved: Lack of visibility into employee attendance and productivity across different locations, inefficient workforce management, and potential compliance issues.
use_cases.solution_approach: Using the mobile app with geo-tagging and geo-fencing to track employee locations and attendance.  Real-time tracking and alerts provide better visibility.

use_cases.title: Simplifying Shift Scheduling in Manufacturing
use_cases.scenario: A manufacturing company with employees working full-time, part-time, on rotating shifts, or with on-call schedules struggles to manage scheduling efficiently and fill vacancies at short notice.
use_cases.problem_solved: Complex and time-consuming scheduling processes, difficulty filling vacancies, and potential for errors and delays.
use_cases.solution_approach: Using auto shift scheduling based on employee availability, skill set, and other criteria.  Prioritizing employees with required expertise for specific processes.
expected_outcomes: Reduced risk of errors and delays

use_cases.title: Ensuring Compliance and Controlling Overtime Costs
use_cases.scenario: A business needs to comply with labor laws and control overtime costs, but struggles with manual time tracking and calculation of hours worked.
use_cases.problem_solved: Risk of non-compliance with labor laws, uncontrolled overtime costs, and inaccurate payroll calculations.
use_cases.solution_approach: Automatic and accurate calculation of hours worked, application of overtime rules specific to individual businesses and locations, and timely visibility into who may be approaching overtime.

use_cases.title: Managing Attendance in Healthcare with Contactless Solutions
use_cases.scenario: A healthcare organization needs to track employee attendance while maintaining workplace hygiene and safety, especially in the context of sanitation and social distancing.
use_cases.problem_solved: Risk of spreading infections, difficulty in maintaining hygiene standards, and potential for attendance fraud.
use_cases.solution_approach: Using contactless biometric technology (facial recognition, palm recognition, thermal scanning, mask detection) to track attendance accurately and enable zero-contact protocols.

use_cases.title: Project-Based Time Tracking for Professional Services
use_cases.scenario: A professional services organization needs to track the time spent by employees on different projects to accurately bill clients and ensure employees are paid correctly.
use_cases.problem_solved: Inaccurate billing, difficulty in tracking project costs, and potential for errors in employee compensation.
use_cases.solution_approach: Using project-based time tracking to track time spent on different projects, shift scheduling to ensure projects are staffed appropriately, and overtime tracking to monitor overtime hours.

use_cases.title: Mobile Workforce Management in Transport and Logistics
use_cases.scenario: A transport and logistics company needs to efficiently manage schedules, absences, productivity, overtime, and analytics for a distributed workforce across multiple locations.
use_cases.problem_solved: Difficulty in tracking employee location and activities, inefficient route optimization, and potential for delays and disruptions.
use_cases.solution_approach: Using the mobile app with GPS-enabled tracking to monitor employee arrivals and departures at checkpoints or depots, create optimized schedules for drivers, and manage time and attendance issues efficiently.

primary_use_cases: Preventing Time Theft and Ghost Employees
Ensuring Compliance and Controlling Overtime Costs
Managing Attendance in Healthcare with Contactless Solutions

differentiators.claim: Comprehensive Biometric Options, Including Advanced Features
differentiators.explanation: Offers a wide range of biometric options, including facial recognition, fingerprint, RFID, mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning, catering to diverse organizational needs and security requirements.  The inclusion of mask and temperature detection is particularly relevant in the current environment.
evidence: Biometric devices to suit every organisation’s needs
Biometric options to meet your needs
A range of options to meet your needs including advanced biometric capabilities such as mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning.

Onsite biometric systems with contactless facial recognition, palm recognition, thermal scanning, mask detection, and temperature detection features ensure better hygiene and maintain greater efficiency in employee attendance throughout your organisation.

differentiators.claim: Flexible Deployment Options: BYOD and Integration with Existing Systems
differentiators.explanation: Supports both a suite of biometric devices and the ability to integrate with existing biometric devices (BYOD - Bring Your Own Device). This provides flexibility and reduces the cost of implementation.
evidence: We can integrate the devices you’re already using

Our ADP SecurTime system integration partners help our clients adopt cloud-based time attendance systems without replacing current biometric systems using ADP SecurTime’s plug-n-play, cloud-based time attendance platform.
compared_to: Systems that don't integrate with existing infrastructure

differentiators.claim: Mobile-First Approach with Geo-Fencing and Geo-Tagging
differentiators.explanation: Strong emphasis on mobile capabilities, including geo-fencing and geo-tagging, making it suitable for managing remote, on-the-go, and distributed workforces.  Features like front camera self-validation and IMEI number tagging enhance security and prevent fraud.
evidence: Live attendance tracking, alerts and notifications
Geo tagging, geo fencing, live tracking, biometric punch and alerts
Simplify workforce management for employees on-the-go
Our mobile app allows only one person to authenticate themselves using a single device. This is made possible by leveraging IMEI number tagging and which prevents proxy.
compared_to: Traditional systems lacking robust mobile capabilities

differentiators.claim: Comprehensive Workforce Management Features on a Single Platform
differentiators.explanation: Offers a wide range of features beyond basic time and attendance, including shift scheduling, leave management, overtime management, role-based dashboards, approval workflows, and employee engagement tools, all integrated into a single platform.
evidence: All your employee information on a single platform
compared_to: Point solutions that only address time and attendance

differentiators.explanation: Offers tailored solutions for various industries, including Manufacturing, Transport & Logistics, Banking and Financial Services, Healthcare, Professional & Technical Services, and Construction, addressing their specific challenges and compliance requirements.
evidence: Whether it’s managing your staff efficiently, dealing with a distributed, mobile workforce, managing a diverse group of workers or simplifying your payroll, your challenges depend on your industry. We offer time and attendance based on industry. Choose your industry to learn more.
compared_to: Solutions not optimized for specific industry needs

unique_capabilities: Advanced biometric options (mask detection, temperature detection)
Mobile app with geo-fencing, geo-tagging, and front camera validation
IMEI number tagging to prevent proxy punching
Web Punch application for on-premise and work-from-home employees
Shift cut-off, shift rotation and on-call tracking for healthcare
competitive_analysis.market_position: A comprehensive cloud-based time and attendance solution suitable for diverse workforces and industries, with a strong emphasis on mobile capabilities and biometric security.
